page.title: 14Meriden-The Primary School.
page.content:
All the work on this area for the Domesday Project was undertaken by Staff and Children from Meriden Primary School in the Summer of 1985.
The children from Classes 3 and 4 all worked on the Project and helped to produce this work.
The school is a small village Primary School with approximately 100 pupils whose ages range from 5 to 11. We are all very proud of our school and our area and would always be pleased to welcome any visitors who may refer to these pages in the future.
Mr. M.J.Evans (Headteacher-July 1985)
